Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Kell
Reviews.Content: I looked at reviews and videos of this phone compared to other phones before I ordered this one. I really loved how the EnV 3 and Octane has the QWERTY keyboard but I wanted an updated look with the touch screen. Phone shipped quick without any issues. The activation of the phone was fine and Verizon did not ask for a data plan. There were two issues I have with the phone: 1.) I ordered this phone as "new" but when I started customizing it, there was already another person's ringtones, recent calls, name card and contacts on the phone. I guess that means it was briefly used by another person. I didn't like having to fix that. 2.) I had to calibrate it a few times to get the touch to be accurate. This is not a sensitive touch screen like you would find in an iPhone or an Android, this is simply an LG. It's more like you have to "press" the buttons than touch. Even after a few calibrations, it is still not accurate, but it functions.What I love about this phone is that there are four different ways you can text. So, if you're a text savvy person, this is great. You get the t9 on portrait, a QWERTY when you flip the phone, the qwerty keyboard when you open the phone, and on the touch screen there is a "pen" selection here you can draw the letters and numbers to text. I would love that feature IF the touch screen was more accurate.Overall, the phone works great and is a good compromise between modern and dinosaur.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied customer!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This phone worked for less than a week.It was not worth the 75.00 I paid for it. Back to square 1

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Janet King
Reviews.Content: Wanted an easy to use phone but yet wanted good quality.  Fit my needs perfectly.  Really love it.Great buy and am happy.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for low price!!
Reviews.Author: onlineshopper
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my husband and he likes it very much. The keys on the keyboard are more spread out and he likes that about it. He needed a simple non-smart phone and this one is perfect!! Phone was in excellent condition and we received it on time!!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it, stops working correctly within a month and a half
Reviews.Author: marygreg21
Reviews.Content: I love this style of phone, but I am very dissapointed with this one.  I have had it for over the 30 day period from purchase, so seller will not exchange, but the phone started not recognizing the touch commands about 2 weeks ago and when I touch to answer a call or to unlock the phone, it doesn't work and I always end up having to call people back.  I have adjusted touch calibration and it doesn't help.  If I touch a 6 I get a 3 or a 9.  It's all messed up and I will now have to buy another phone.  Don't buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Worst phone I've ever owned!!!
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: When its working it isn’t a bad phone. Why the worst I’ve owned? The battery doesn’t stay charged. I bought new batteries twice and they weren’t any better after several weeks of use. I’ve read these 11000’s eat batteries but I wish I’d known that before I bought mine. I used to keep it plugged into a USB most of the time just to be able to have cell use when I was away from a USB a couple hours.Now the mini plug on the phone is failing. I suppose because I have had to use it so often and now it’s prematurely failed.I highly suggest staying away from this 11000. It’ll REALLY work ya.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: lori freom
Reviews.Content: very pleased a great old phone will order form amazon again as always try too...easy to use  thank you again

Reviews.Title: if i were to go back to a basic phone  I'd choose this one
Reviews.Author: George Tarasenko
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my mother. She says the icons are too small. but if i were to go back to a basic phone.  I'd choose this one

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Derrick
Reviews.Content: i'd like that phone it was very nice someone else to will get it will like it the phone good phone

Reviews.Title: Works fine.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Lee
Reviews.Content: Delivered promptly. Works fine. Touch screen is not working that well, but when I flip it open, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Tammy Weldon
Reviews.Content: This is a great replacement phone. I was able to call and activate it as soon as I got it in the mail.Delivery was fast and accurate.

Reviews.Title: Okay but more worn than expected
Reviews.Author: Jessica Rubin Klein
Reviews.Content: The phone came on time but there were more scratches on the screen than we expected and the touch screen tends to stick.The keyboard works fine and the keys seem to be working fine. NOt

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Hamilton
Reviews.Content: I wasn't to happy about the scratches on the screen, but other than that it works okay. Some times I do have a problem scrolling down on the front screen. I only got it cause my other phone had broken. So, it's okay for the mean time, I just wish the screen didn't have a lot of scratches when I got it.

Reviews.Title: Lg evn touch
Reviews.Author: Julia Kurtz
Reviews.Content: It works good besides a few scratches on it, so no big deal. Overall good phone happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: LG enV
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Great phone for just a basic phone. Don't try setting this phone up online as it automatically asks for a data plan. Call verizon to have them set up over the phone.

Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: ajkailing
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 10 yr old daughter to replace a contract phone that broke, I was able to add this to our verizon plan easily and not extend her contract time.  I am considering doing this for all of our phones in the future.  She LOVES this phone, and besides a few tiny scratches around the camera hole you would never know it was used!  Fast shipment and I really liked the letter they mailed asking for the chance to make it right prior to leaving any negative feedback, The memory isn't much so I would definately recommend getting an additional sd card for it, if you plan on downloading any music.

Reviews.Title: wirth the price
Reviews.Author: Dixie
Reviews.Content: phone does not work from front screen but worth it as a quick replacement for my grandson's other phone. acceptable.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: truckin B
Reviews.Content: Love it. Works great. It was a gift and theyssaid it's great. It does just what it is needed to do.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Patty Martin
Reviews.Content: so far....so good.  My grandson loves it and his father (my son) liked it so well that he had me order him one.  All the great features of the Envy3 but with a touch screen.  We love the Envy3 and this works just as well.  We like just the basic phones and they are hard to come by.  Had I not just bought 2 really nice covers for my envy3 I would get the touch for myself.  Easy to use and works great.  Hope it stays that way.

Reviews.Title: Nice used phone
Reviews.Author: Bmw192
Reviews.Content: So far so good. haven't had any problems yet. will post if i have any problems.would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: Leah H.
Reviews.Content: Was very pleased. One of the buttons sticks sometimes but all around I am glad I purchased this device :) a good choice

Reviews.Title: This is a data phone
Reviews.Author: kim gray
Reviews.Content: Verizon charged me a ten dollar data plan for this phone. I returned it. Otherwise it was a good phone back in the day. The one i got was defective and i returned it though. No problem with refund.

Reviews.Title: Loved the product
Reviews.Author: Denise Warner
Reviews.Content: Received quickly, product as described. Great seller! This is a perfect first phone for those of us parents that don't think that children need smartphones!

Reviews.Title: Not usable.
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: Some points of the touch screen did not work.  Phone was physically dirty.  Not usable for me. It is oing back.

Reviews.Title: Phone worked
Reviews.Author: Sunny S. Ramage
Reviews.Content: My daughter would love to have a smart phone, but until I'm ready to take on that cost, I got her this and she loves is. Said it works great
